official_title: Screen to Save: NCI Colorectal Cancer Outreach & Screening Initiative
inclusion_criteria:
* Between 45 and 75 years of age
* Spanish or English speaking
* Able to provide informed consent
* Reside in the Tampa Bay area (namely Hillsborough, Pinellas, Polk or Pasco county)
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 45 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
